content.text: As of the latest report, CleanSpark Inc has institutional ownership of 10.64%. Some of the major institutional investors include BlackRock, Vanguard Group, and Morgan Stanley.
Insider ownership in CleanSpark Inc stands at 14.20%. The largest insider shareholder is Matthew Schultz, who holds approximately 3.72% of the company's shares.

CleanSpark Inc has several major shareholders. The largest shareholder is Matthew Schultz, followed by BlackRock, which holds a significant stake in the company. Other major shareholders include institutional investors like Vanguard Group, Morgan Stanley, and Renaissance Technologies.
